CellDat instance that contains the actual particle data.

Number of cells this ParticleDat is defined on.
Flat to indicate if this ParticleDat is to hold particle positions or.
Compute device used by the instance.

detaileddescription.para: Create a new ParticleDat.

Sym object that defines the type and label.
Number of components, of type defined in sym.
Number of cells this ParticleDat is defined over.
Does this Dat hold particle positions or cell ids.

detaileddescription.para: Add particle data to the ParticleDat.

parameterdescription.para: Number of new particles to add.
Indicate if there is new data to copy of if the data should be initialised with zeros.
Cell indices of the new particles.
Layer (row) indices of the new particles.

detaileddescription.para: Realloc the underlying CellDat such that the indicated new number of particles can be stored.

memberdef.name: copy_particle_data

detaileddescription.para: Asynchronously copy particle data from old cells/layers to new cells/layers.

parameterdescription.para: Number of particles to copy.
Device pointer to an array of old cells.
Device pointer to an array of new cells.
Device pointer to an array of old layers.
Device pointer to an array of new layers.

simplesect.para: sycl::event to wait on for data copy.

detaileddescription.para: Get the number of particles stored in all cells
Async call to set d_npart_cells from a device buffer. npart_device_to_host must be called on event completion.

parameterdescription.para: Device accessible pointer to an array containing new cell counts.

simplesect.para: sycl::event to wait on for completion.

detaileddescription.para: Set cell particle counts from host accessible pointer. npart_host_to_device must be called to set counts on the device.

parameterdescription.para: Host pointer to cell particle counts.

detaileddescription.para: Set the particle count in a single cell. Assigns on both host and device.

parameterdescription.para: Cell to set particle count for.
New particle count for cell.

detaileddescription.para: Set particle counts in cells from std::vector. Sets on both host and device.

parameterdescription.para: std::vector of new particle counts per cell.

detaileddescription.para: Set the particle counts in cells from a BufferHost. Sets on both host and device.

parameterdescription.para: New particle counts per cell.

detaileddescription.para: Asynchronously set the particle counts in cells from a BufferHost. Sets on both host and device.

parameterdescription.para: New particle counts per cell.

simplesect.para: sycl::event to wait on for device assignment.

detaileddescription.para: Reduce the row count of the underlying CellDat to the per cell particle occupancies.
Utility function to print the contents of all or a select range of cells.

parameterdescription.para: Optional first cell to start printing from.
Optional end cell +1 to end printing at.

detaileddescription.para: Get an upper bound for the number of particles. May be a very bad approximation.

simplesect.para: Upper bound for number of particles.

detaileddescription.para: Get the size of the iteration set required to loop over all particles with the particle loop macros.
Get the size of the iteration set per cell stride required to loop over all particles with the particle loop macros.
Get a device pointer to the array that stores particle counts per cell for the particle loop macros.

simplesect.para: Device pointer to particle counts per cell.

detaileddescription.para: Wait for a realloc to complete.
Wrapper around a CellDat to store particle data on a per cell basis.
